### Info

The official US **PSX** version of Legend of Mana instruction book / game manual. It's rather large, but it is complete and in color. Physical print quality might not be decent quality. { .text-wrap-balance }

- **Size:** 10,804 kB (10.8 MB)
- **Format:** PDF (Portable Document Format)
- **Features:** Color
